name: Slots Golden Tomb Casino - FREE Vegas Slot Machine Games worthy of a Pharaoh!
name_original: Slots Golden Tomb Casino - FREE Vegas Slot Machine Games worthy of a Pharaoh!
description:
* 15,000 FREE Golden Coins for new players!!! *

Enjoy MEGA WINS and tons of Bonuses in the secret Golden Tomb! Experience Slots like never before with amazing HD Graphics and luxurious Slot Gameplay!

Bigger Bets = Bigger Wins!!!

Just 'tap' to Spin!

Premium features include:
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- 5 reels with up to 30 lines!
- FREE daily gold coins!
- 3 deluxe mini-games to max your payouts!
- No internet connection required to play!
- Game Center integration - Compete against your friends and show them who's boss!

Good luck, and enjoy!
